item.title: The Top 10 Spotify Podcasts To Listen To This Week (October 15)
item.description: Here are the top 10 podcasts on Spotify to listen to this week from interviews to crime to world news you should know about.

item.title: Apple Update Stops iPhone Users Replying To Millions Of Texts
item.description: You have been warned about these texts — check this setting now.

item.title: An Update On A ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Live-Action Movie On Netflix
item.description: KPop Demon Hunters has many paths forward and one of them could be a live-action remake movie. We have an update on that front.
